testimonialsSubtitle: See what our customers are saying about switching to Vouch Mobile

faqs.question: What network does Vouch Mobile use?
faqs.answer: Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's nationwide 4G LTE and 5G network, giving you coverage in 99% of the country. You get the same towers and coverage as AT&T customers at a fraction of the cost.

faqs.question: Is there really no credit check?
faqs.answer: Correct! Vouch Mobile never performs credit checks. Everyone gets approved instantly regardless of credit history. We believe great wireless shouldn't depend on your credit score.

faqs.question: Can I keep my current phone number?
faqs.answer: Yes! We make it easy to transfer your existing number from any carrier. The process typically takes just a few minutes during activation.

faqs.question: What happens if I go over my data limit?
faqs.answer: On our unlimited plans, you'll never be charged overage fees. After using your high-speed data allotment, speeds may be reduced during network congestion, but you'll always stay connected.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faqs.answer: No hidden fees, ever. The price you see is the price you pay. Taxes and regulatory fees are included in your monthly bill.

faqs.question: How do I activate my service?
faqs.answer: Activation is simple! Order your free SIM card (or use eSIM for instant activation), download the Vouch Mobile app, and follow the easy setup steps. Most customers are up and running in under 5 minutes.

faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our affordable unlimited plans
ctaText: Join thousands of smart switchers who save hundreds every year without sacrificing quality or coverage.
ctaNote: Free shipping on all orders. Activate in minutes.

faqs.question: What makes Vouch Mobile prepaid plans different?
faqs.answer: Unlike most prepaid carriers that deprioritize your data, Vouch Mobile gives you priority access on AT&T's network. You get the same speeds as postpaid customers without the contracts or credit checks.

faqs.question: Can I switch to prepaid from my current carrier?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Switching is easy and you can keep your current phone number. Most customers complete the switch in under 15 minutes.

faqs.question: What happens when my prepaid period ends?
faqs.answer: Your service continues seamlessly with AutoPay enabled. Without AutoPay, you'll receive a reminder before your service expires so you never lose connectivity unexpectedly.

faqs.question: Is prepaid really the same quality as postpaid?
faqs.answer: With Vouch Mobile, yes! We don't throttle your speeds or deprioritize your data like traditional prepaid carriers. You get premium service at prepaid prices.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.

ctaText: Experience premium wireless with the freedom of prepaid. No contracts, no surprises.

faqs.question: What is 5G and do I need it?
faqs.answer: 5G is the latest generation of mobile network technology, offering significantly faster speeds and lower latency than 4G. If you stream video, play mobile games, or work remotely, 5G will noticeably improve your experience.

faqs.question: Will my phone work with Vouch Mobile's 5G?
faqs.answer: Most phones from 2020 onwards support 5G. You can check your phone's compatibility on our website or in the Vouch Mobile app. If your phone doesn't support 5G, you'll still get great 4G LTE coverage.

faqs.question: Is 5G coverage available in my area?
faqs.answer: Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's 5G network, which covers 200+ cities and is expanding rapidly. Check our coverage map to see 5G availability in your specific area.

faqs.question: Will I get charged more if I use 5G?
faqs.answer: No! 5G access is included in all our plans at no extra charge. Unlike some carriers, we don't charge a premium for 5G connectivity.

faqs.question: How fast is 5G compared to 4G?
faqs.answer: 5G can be up to 10-100 times faster than 4G. In real-world usage, you can expect download speeds of 100-500 Mbps on 5G compared to 25-50 Mbps on 4G LTE.

faqs.question: Does 5G use more battery?
faqs.answer: Early 5G phones did have slightly higher battery usage, but modern 5G devices are optimized to manage power efficiently. Most users don't notice a significant difference.

ctaText: Join the 5G revolution without breaking the bank. Premium 5G speeds, prepaid freedom.

testimonials.quote: After being trapped in a 2-year contract with my old carrier, Vouch Mobile's no-contract approach is refreshing. I stay because I want to, not because I have to.
testimonials.name: Michelle S.

testimonials.quote: I paused my service during a 2-month trip abroad and picked right back up when I returned. No other carrier made that so easy.

testimonials.quote: Switched from T-Mobile where they wanted $200 to cancel. With Vouch, I know I can leave anytime. That freedom is priceless.

faqs.question: What does no contract really mean?
faqs.answer: No contract means you're not locked into any long-term agreement. You pay month-to-month and can cancel, pause, or change your plan at any time without paying early termination fees or penalties.

faqs.question: Can I really cancel anytime without fees?
faqs.answer: Yes! With Vouch Mobile, you can cancel your service at any time with zero termination fees. Your service continues until the end of your paid period, and you can even keep your phone number if you're switching to another carrier.

faqs.question: What happens if I want to pause my service?
faqs.answer: You can pause your Vouch Mobile service for up to 3 months through the app. During the pause, you won't be charged, and your number will be reserved. Simply unpause when you're ready to resume service.

faqs.question: Is the service quality the same without a contract?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You get the exact same AT&T network coverage, 5G speeds, and features whether you're on a month-to-month plan or if you'd been with us for years. No compromises.

faqs.question: Do I need to pass a credit check?
faqs.answer: No credit check required! Since there's no contract, we don't need to check your credit. Everyone gets approved instantly regardless of credit history.

faqs.question: Can I switch between plans easily?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle, and there are never any fees to switch plans.

ctaText: Join thousands who chose flexibility over contracts. Premium wireless, no commitments.

faqs.question: How can Vouch Mobile be so cheap?
faqs.answer: As an MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator), we lease network capacity from AT&T at wholesale rates. We don't have expensive retail stores or massive marketing budgets, so we pass those savings directly to you.

faqs.question: Is cheap unlimited data actually unlimited?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our unlimited plans are truly unlimited - no data caps and no overage charges. Some plans may have reduced speeds during network congestion after using a certain amount of high-speed data, but you'll never be cut off.

faqs.question: What's the catch with these low prices?
faqs.answer: There's no catch! You get the same AT&T network, same coverage, same 5G access. The only difference is we operate more efficiently and charge less. No hidden fees, no contracts, no surprises.

faqs.question: Will my service quality be worse because it's cheaper?
faqs.answer: Not at all. You're using AT&T's same towers and infrastructure. Your calls, texts, and data work identically to AT&T's own customers. The savings come from our business model, not from reduced service quality.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees I should know about?
faqs.answer: Zero hidden fees. Your monthly price includes all taxes and regulatory fees. The price you see on our website is exactly what you pay - that's our promise.

faqs.question: Can I really get unlimited data for $15/month?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our Budget Unlimited plan at $15/month includes unlimited talk, text, and data. You get 10GB of high-speed data, and unlimited data at reduced speeds after that. It's perfect for moderate data users.

ctaText: Why pay $70-80/month when you can get the same service for $25? Start saving today.

faqs.question: What is mobile hotspot and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Mobile hotspot lets you share your phone's cellular data connection with other devices like laptops, tablets, or other phones. Your phone essentially becomes a portable WiFi router that other devices can connect to.

faqs.question: How much hotspot data do I need?
faqs.answer: It depends on your usage. 5GB is good for occasional email and light browsing. 10GB works well for regular use including some video streaming. 20GB is ideal for heavy users who work remotely or travel frequently.

faqs.question: Does hotspot usage count against my phone data?
faqs.answer: Hotspot data is separate from your phone's high-speed data allocation. If you have 10GB of hotspot, that's specifically for tethering, not pulled from your phone's unlimited data pool.

faqs.question: How fast is the hotspot connection?
faqs.answer: Your hotspot uses the same 5G or 4G LTE connection as your phone. In good coverage areas, you can expect speeds comparable to home WiFi - easily fast enough for video calls, streaming, and general work tasks.

faqs.question: Can I connect multiple devices at once?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can connect up to 10 devices to your Vouch Mobile hotspot simultaneously. Perfect for families or connecting your laptop and tablet at the same time.

faqs.question: What happens when I use all my hotspot data?
faqs.answer: When you reach your hotspot limit, the hotspot feature pauses until your next billing cycle. Your regular phone service continues unaffected. You can also upgrade your plan mid-cycle if you need more hotspot data.

ctaTitle: Get a Plan with Real Hotspot
ctaText: Share your connection with all your devices. Work, play, and stream from anywhere.

testimonials.name: Derek P.

faqs.question: How does pay as you go work?
faqs.answer: Instead of paying every month automatically, you purchase service credit when you need it. Your balance stays active for 90 days, and you only reload when you want to continue service.

faqs.question: What happens when my 90 days expire?
faqs.answer: Your service pauses but your phone number is reserved for 60 additional days. Simply reload within that window to reactivate your service and keep your number.

faqs.question: Does unused data really roll over?
faqs.answer: Yes! Any unused high-speed data from your current period carries over when you reload within the validity window. It's a great way to build up a data bank for heavy usage months.

faqs.question: Is pay as you go good for my main phone?
faqs.answer: It can be! If you're a light user or have inconsistent needs, pay as you go can save you money. Heavy users might prefer our monthly unlimited plans for better value.

faqs.question: Can I switch to a monthly plan later?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can switch to any of our monthly plans at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Your number transfers seamlessly and any remaining balance converts to account credit.

faqs.question: How do I check my balance and usage?
faqs.answer: The Vouch Mobile app shows your current balance, data usage, and days remaining in real-time. You can also set up alerts to notify you when your balance gets low.

ctaText: Stop paying for service you don't use. Pay as you go puts you in complete control.

faqs.question: Can I use apps without a data plan?
faqs.answer: You can use apps when connected to WiFi. Without a data plan, apps won't work over cellular. Our Talk Plus plan includes 500MB for basic app functionality like messaging apps.

faqs.question: Who is a talk and text only plan good for?
faqs.answer: These plans are perfect for seniors who primarily call and text, kids getting their first phone, backup phones, or anyone who has WiFi access everywhere and doesn't need cellular data.

faqs.question: Will my smartphone work with talk and text only?
faqs.answer: Yes! Any phone compatible with our network will work. Your smartphone will function normally for calls and texts, and use WiFi for data-dependent features like browsing and apps.

faqs.question: Can I add data later if I need it?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to any of our data plans at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.

faqs.question: Is unlimited text really unlimited?
faqs.answer: Yes, truly unlimited! Send and receive as many text messages (SMS and MMS) as you want with no limits or extra charges.

faqs.question: Does the plan include picture messaging?
faqs.answer: Yes, MMS (picture and video messaging) is included in all our talk and text plans at no extra charge.

ctaText: Not everyone needs unlimited data. Get reliable communication at an unbeatable price.

faqs.question: Why are single line plans cheaper at Vouch Mobile?
faqs.answer: Unlike major carriers who inflate single-line prices to push family plans, we offer the same fair rate to everyone. Our efficient MVNO model means we can offer premium service at reasonable prices for all customers.

faqs.question: Can I get the same features as family plans?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our single line plans include all the same features - 5G access, mobile hotspot, unlimited data - that family plan users get. You don't sacrifice anything by being an individual user.

faqs.question: What if I want to add a line later?
faqs.answer: No problem! You can add additional lines to your account at any time. Each line gets its own great rate, and you can manage everything from one account if you'd like.

faqs.question: How do single line prices compare to competitors?
faqs.answer: Major carriers like Verizon and AT&T charge $75-80/month for a single unlimited line. Vouch Mobile offers comparable service for just $25/month - that's over $600 in annual savings.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum number of lines required?
faqs.answer: Nope! One line is all you need. There's no minimum line requirement and no pressure to add more. We welcome single-line customers.

faqs.question: Do I get my own separate account?
faqs.answer: Yes! You have your own individual account with your own login, bill, and settings. You're not grouped with anyone or dependent on another account holder.

ctaTitle: Get Great Rates on Your Own
ctaText: You shouldn't need a family plan to get a fair price. Get individual value at Vouch Mobile.

faqs.question: What is an MVNO and how does it work?
faqs.answer: MVNO stands for Mobile Virtual Network Operator. Vouch Mobile leases network capacity from AT&T at wholesale rates and passes those savings to you. You get the same AT&T towers and coverage, just at a much lower price.

faqs.question: Is this really the same as AT&T service?
faqs.answer: Yes! Your calls, texts, and data all travel through AT&T's towers and infrastructure. The coverage map is identical to AT&T's. The only difference is the billing - you pay Vouch Mobile instead of AT&T.

faqs.question: Will my AT&T phone work with Vouch Mobile?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Any phone currently working on AT&T will work seamlessly with Vouch Mobile. Just swap in our SIM card (or activate eSIM) and you're ready to go.

faqs.question: Do I get 5G on the AT&T network?
faqs.answer: Yes! Vouch Mobile includes full access to AT&T's 5G network at no extra charge. Wherever AT&T has 5G coverage, you'll have 5G coverage.

faqs.question: Why is Vouch Mobile so much cheaper than AT&T?
faqs.answer: We don't have expensive retail stores, celebrity endorsements, or massive marketing budgets. As an MVNO, we operate efficiently and pass those savings directly to our customers.

faqs.question: Can I keep my current phone number?
faqs.answer: Yes! Transferring your number from AT&T (or any carrier) is simple and free. Most transfers complete in under 10 minutes.

ctaText: Same nationwide 5G network. Same great coverage. Half the monthly cost.
